Welcome to

Sunrise Care Centre

Explore
Contact Us

caring for the elderly since 1963

Thinking about retirement?
We’re here to help.

At Edenhaven, we prioritize the well-being and happiness of our residents. Our vibrant community offers a range of engaging activities and top-notch amenities designed to enhance your quality of life. Join us at Edenhaven, where we treat our residents like family and create a warm, welcoming atmosphere filled with friendship and care.

24/7 Nursing Care

24/7 medical support for our residents' peace of mind

Nutritional Meals

Nutritious, delicious meals served three times a day

WIFI AVAILABLE

Keeping you connected with your loved ones.

Social events

Engaging social events and activities to enrich daily life.

Call or send us an email

We would love to answer all of your questions or tell you more about our amazing community that many happy residents call home

Living Options
Contact Us

passionate and committed

Over 60 dedicated staff members

At Sunrise Care Centre, over 60 skilled professionals are committed to delivering exceptional care and service to our residents. Each member of our team brings a wealth of expertise and a genuine passion for enhancing the lives of our seniors. We pride ourselves on creating a warm and supportive environment where residents feel valued and respected every day.

Our staff’s dedication goes beyond mere caregiving; it encompasses a holistic approach that prioritizes physical, mental, and emotional well-being. By fostering strong, compassionate relationships with our residents, we ensure that everyone at Edenhaven experiences a sense of belonging and family. Discover the difference that our committed team makes in providing top-notch care in a vibrant and nurturing community.

Our Team

Accomodation options

Explore our living space options

Assisted living

Enjoy comfortable, mid-care living quarters with optional en-suite bathrooms, complete with room cleaning and laundry services.

Learn More

CAre Centre

Receive exceptional 24-hour nursing care from our professional staff in our dedicated living space. Choose from private rooms or shared rooms.

Learn More

independant living

Choose from our comfortable Bed-Sitter rooms or Bachelor apartments, both designed for independent living. Discover the perfect balance.

Learn More

facilities available

Your wellness is our priority

Weekly Excercise

Stay active and healthy with our regular exercise sessions tailored to all fitness levels. Our weekly exercise programs include a variety of activities designed to promote physical well-being, enhance mobility, and boost overall energy.

Social events

Engage in a vibrant social life with our diverse range of activities. From arts and crafts, bingo, and puzzle building to Saturday movies, music concert afternoons, and Friday Pub & Braai Nights, there's always something happening at Edenhaven.

Medical support

Benefit from comprehensive medical support services right on site. Our dedicated team includes a resident doctor, audiologist, physiotherapist, and wound care specialist, ensuring all your health needs are met with professional expertise.

Services & Facilities

What People have to say about Edenhaven

My mom has never been happier. Old folks treated like royalty.
Paul Nel
My Mom is very happy at Edenhaven. I feel, and she says she is being well looked after. The loving and caring staff are amazing.
Ray Fray-Wilson
My dad lives there. Best caring place ever.
John Benade
